meanings.definition: A type of snake found in South America.
meanings.sent1: The zookeeper carefully handled the bilboas during feeding time.
meanings.sent2: I read a book about bilboas and their habitats in the rainforest.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous monkey tried to scare the bilboas by making funny faces.
meanings.sent4: The winding river resembled a slithering line of bilboas in the dense jungle.
meanings.sent5: The children were amazed by the colorful scales of the bilboas at the reptile exhibit.

meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Brazil.
meanings.sent1: She exchanged her dollars for bilboas before traveling to Brazil.
meanings.sent2: The price of the souvenir was ten bilboas at the market.
meanings.sent3: The street performer juggled bilboas to entertain the crowd.
meanings.sent4: Inflation caused the value of bilboas to fluctuate rapidly.
meanings.sent5: The shopkeeper counted the bilboas carefully before closing the store.

meanings.definition: A type of plant native to the Andes.
meanings.sent1: The hiker admired the vibrant bilboas growing along the mountain trail.
meanings.sent2: The botanist studied the unique characteristics of bilboas in their natural habitat.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous goat nibbled on the bilboas, thinking they were tasty snacks.
meanings.sent4: The fields of bilboas swayed gently in the mountain breeze.
meanings.sent5: The villagers believed that the bilboas held mystical healing properties.
